mapper.sql: UPDATED_USER, EXPIRE_DATE, CALCLATE_PERIOD, SIGN_DATE, RATE, CREATED_USER, CHANNEL_CODE, FINANCE_CHANNEL, REMARK, DEPT_CODE, UPDATED_DATE, CONFER_TYPE, CONFER_CODE, EXTEND_CONFER_CODE, GRANT_FLAG, VALID_IND, CREATED_DATE, VALID_DATE, FEATURE, GRANT_DEPT, CONFER_ID, APPROVE_FLAG, CALCLATE_FLAG, COMM_TYPE

mn.UPDATED_USER, to_char(mn.EXPIRE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "EXPIRE_DATE", CALCLATE_PERIOD, to_char(mn.SIGN_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "SIGN_DATE", RATE, mn.CREATED_USER, mn.CHANNEL_CODE, mn.REMARK, mn.DEPT_CODE, mn.UPDATED_DATE, CONFER_CODE, EXTEND_CONFER_CODE, GRANT_FLAG, mn.VALID_IND, mn.CREATED_DATE, to_char(mn.VALID_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "VALID_DATE", GRANT_DEPT, CONFER_ID, CALCLATE_FLAG, COMM_TYPE as "paymentTax"

UPDATED_USER as "updatedUser", EXPIRE_DATE as "expireDate", CALCLATE_PERIOD as "calclatePeriod", SIGN_DATE as "signDate", RATE as "rate", CREATED_USER as "createdUser", CHANNEL_CODE as "channelCode", FINANCE_CHANNEL as "financeChannel", REMARK as "remark", DEPT_CODE as "deptCode", UPDATED_DATE as "updatedDate", CONFER_TYPE as "conferType", CONFER_CODE as "conferCode", EXTEND_CONFER_CODE as "extendConferCode", GRANT_FLAG as "grantFlag", VALID_IND as "validInd", CREATED_DATE as "createdDate", VALID_DATE as "validDate", FEATURE as "feature", GRANT_DEPT as "grantDept", CONFER_ID as "conferId", APPROVE_FLAG as "approveFlag", CALCLATE_FLAG as "calclateFlag", COMM_TYPE as "commType"
mapper.update:
update CHANNEL_CONFER
UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPIRE_DATE = #{expireDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CALCLATE_PERIOD = #{calclatePeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SIGN_DATE = #{signDate,jdbcType=DATE},
RATE = #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINANCE_CHANNEL = #{financeChannel,jdbcType=CHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CONFER_TYPE = #{conferType,jdbcType=CHAR},
EXTEND_CONFER_CODE = #{extendConferCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRANT_FLAG = #{grantFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
VALID_IND = #{validInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE},
VALID_DATE = #{validDate,jdbcType=DATE},
FEATURE = #{feature,jdbcType=CHAR},
GRANT_DEPT = #{grantDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where CONFER_CODE = #{conferCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CHANNEL_CONFER set UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPIRE_DATE = #{expireDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CALCLATE_PERIOD = #{calclatePeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SIGN_DATE = #{signDate,jdbcType=DATE}, RATE = #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINANCE_CHANNEL = #{financeChannel,jdbcType=CHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CONFER_TYPE = #{conferType,jdbcType=CHAR}, EXTEND_CONFER_CODE = #{extendConferCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRANT_FLAG = #{grantFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, VALID_IND = #{validInd,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE}, VALID_DATE = #{validDate,jdbcType=DATE}, FEATURE = #{feature,jdbcType=CHAR}, GRANT_DEPT = #{grantDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CONFER_CODE = #{conferCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CHANNEL_CONFER
APPROVE_FLAG = '0', UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE,
APPROVE_CODE = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPIRE_DATE = to_date(#{expireDate,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'),
CALCLATE_PERIOD = #{calclatePeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SIGN_DATE = to_date(#{signDate,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'),
RATE = #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINANCE_CHANNEL = #{financeChannel,jdbcType=CHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONFER_TYPE = #{conferType,jdbcType=CHAR},
EXTEND_CONFER_CODE = #{extendConferCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRANT_FLAG = #{grantFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
VALID_IND = #{validInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE},
VALID_DATE = to_date(#{validDate,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'),
FEATURE = #{feature,jdbcType=CHAR},
GRANT_DEPT = #{grantDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
calclate_flag = #{calclateFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comm_type = #{paymentTax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where CONFER_CODE = #{conferCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CHANNEL_CONFER set UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPIRE_DATE = to_date(#{expireDate,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'), SIGN_DATE = to_date(#{signDate,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'), VALID_DATE = to_date(#{validDate,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'), CALCLATE_PERIOD = #{calclatePeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RATE = #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINANCE_CHANNEL = #{financeChannel,jdbcType=CHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DATE = sysdate,
EXTEND_CONFER_CODE = #{extendConferCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRANT_FLAG = #{grantFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, FEATURE = #{feature,jdbcType=CHAR}, GRANT_DEPT = #{grantDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVE_FLAG = #{approveFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, APPROVE_CODE = #{approveCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CONFER_CODE = #{conferCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(1) from CHANNEL_CONFER where CONFER_CODE = #{conferCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select * from ( select a.*,rownum rn from ( select , MEDIUM_CNAME,DEPT_SIMPLE_NAME DEPT_CNAME, decode(APPROVE_FLAG, '0', '未审核', '1', '已审核', '已审核') as APPROVE_FLAG, sa.salesman_cname APPROVE_CODE, decode(CONFER_TYPE, 'B', '代理协议', 'Q', '经纪协议', 'H', '互联网服务协议', '') as "conferTypeName", CONFER_TYPE as "conferType" from CHANNEL_CONFER mn left join CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL pb on pb.CHANNEL_CODE = mn.CHANNEL_CODE left join DEPARTMENT dept on mn.DEPT_CODE = dept.DEPT_CODE left join salesman sa on mn.APPROVE_CODE = sa.employ_code
order by mn.EXPIRE_DATE desc ) a where rownum <= #{endpoint} ) where rn >= #{startpoint}

select * from ( select a.*,rownum rn from ( select , mn.confer_type as "conferType", pb.CHANNEL_NAME,DEPT_SIMPLE_NAME DEPT_CNAME, decode(APPROVE_FLAG, '0', '未审核', '1', '已审核', '已审核') APPROVE_FLAG, sa.salesman_cname APPROVE_CODE, decode(FINANCE_CHANNEL, '0', '否', '1', '是', '') FINANCE_CHANNEL, fe.CHANNEL_NAME FEATURE from CHANNEL_CONFER mn left join CHANNEL_AGENT_DETAIL pb on pb.CHANNEL_CODE = mn.CHANNEL_CODE left join DEPARTMENT dept on mn.DEPT_CODE = dept.DEPT_CODE left join CHANNEL_FEATURE fe on fe.CHANNEL_CODE = mn.FEATURE left join salesman sa on mn.APPROVE_CODE = sa.employ_code
order by mn.EXPIRE_DATE desc ) a where rownum <= #{endpoint} ) where rn >= #{startpoint}

select , MEDIUM_CNAME,mn.DEPT_CODE || '-' || DEPT_SIMPLE_NAME DEPT_CNAME,CONFER_TYPE from CHANNEL_CONFER mn left join CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL pb on pb.CHANNEL_CODE = mn.CHANNEL_CODE left join DEPARTMENT dept on mn.DEPT_CODE = dept.DEPT_CODE
where 1=1
and mn.CONFER_CODE = #{conferCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and 1=2

select , CHANNEL_NAME,mn.DEPT_CODE || '-' || DEPT_SIMPLE_NAME DEPT_CNAME,FINANCE_CHANNEL,FEATURE from CHANNEL_CONFER mn left join CHANNEL_Agent_DETAIL pb on pb.CHANNEL_CODE = mn.CHANNEL_CODE left join DEPARTMENT dept on mn.DEPT_CODE = dept.DEPT_CODE

when.test: endpoint!=null and endpoint != '' and startpoint != null and startpoint != ''

mapper.update: update CHANNEL_CONFER set DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVE_FLAG = '0', UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DATE = sysdate where 1=1 and CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VALID_IND = '1' and DEPT_CODE != #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
